response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds significant worth to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and rarity. I am offering this product to you at a special price, believing that it could be a perfect match for your needs or desires.

To make this offer even more enticing, I would like to propose a deal where you can purchase the product for $1,200,000. This price reflects my commitment to finding the right owner for this item while ensuring a fair return for its value.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further. I am open to negotiation and would be delighted to hear your thoughts on how we might reach an agreement that benefits both of us.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
